# Disruptive
## Overview
*Disruptive*: When raging, the barbarian gains Disruptive as a bonus feat. The barbarian must have the [[Superstition (Ex)|superstition]] rage power to select this rage power. A barbarian must be at least 8th level to select this rage power.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 74
